body.name: BON AUGURE Industrial Bookshelves and Bookcases, Farmhouse Large Book Shelves, 5 Tier Heavy Duty Open Bookcase, Tall Wood Metal Shelving Unit for Living Room, Bedroom, Office (Rustic Oak)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 16 mins
features: Industrial 5 Tier Bookshelf: A large and functional bookshelf is a great way to declutter your space while creating a modern look in any room of your home. This rustic wooden book shelf includes five 43 inches wide shelves to provide spacious display room without occupying a lot space. You'll be able to showcase most types of your favorite books and collections.

Higher Weight Capacity: Thanks to high-quality MDF shelves and 3 pcs heavy duty metal frame, the weight capacity of this standing bookshelf increased enormously. Each layer can hold up to 150 lbs easily. With this tall and double wide book shelving, you can make use of each space in your house to display numerous books, plants, decorations or any heavy stuff.

Thoughtful Design: This 5 shelf bookcase comes with 6 pcs adjustable lever to protect your floors from scratches while keep shelf stands stable on uneven floor or carpet. Two X-frame backing braces provide reinforcement and stability greatly. And anti-tip strap also included, you can mount it to the wall just in case unexpected tipping.

Dimensions: Overall size: 12.6"D x 43.31"W x 65.8"H. Space between each shelf is 13.77 inches. With 65.8 inch wide etagere bookcase, you can store a lot on it without occupying more space, while adding individual character and aesthetic feeling to your space.

Super Easy Assembly: This wood and metal open shelving unit only takes around 30 minutes to assemble. Necessary hardware and instruction provided. If you have any questions before or after purchasing, you can email us anytime, we always reply within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multifunctional Etagere Bookcase BON AUGURE Large Wide 5 Tier Bookshelf Create ample display space in the office or living area with this charming industrial tall and wide bookcase. The rustic large shelves set within eye-catching open framing that creates a distinctive look with airy and durable appeal.

Highlights Anti-tip Strap Anti-tip Strap for anchor the bookcase to the wall, prevent injury from unexpected tipping. X-Shaped Crossbar The crossbar on the back strengthen the stability of the frame make the bookshelf more stable and durable. Adjustable Levelers Adjustable levelers help to keep the the book shelf stands stably on uneven floor or rug. They can also protect your floor from scratched. Higher Weight Capacity Thanks to good design and high quality shelves, each layer can hold up to 150 lbs stuff.

Specification Dimensions 65.83'' H x 43.31'' W x 12.60'' D Item Weight 50.15 pounds Weight Capacity Up to 150 lbs per shelf Material MDF board and metal tube frame Finish Black sandy powder coated and rustic oak wood grain finish Package A bookshelf, tools and instructions Tipover Restraint Device Included Estimated Time to Set Up 25 minutes

We have a professional after-sales team, please feel free to find us, we will send you the replacement part ASAP. How to clean and maintain the bookshelf? Just wipe it with a dry rag. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and nice looking!
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy bookshelf. Easy to assemble and great value for the cost. Perfect addition to any room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this shelf! I originally purchased the shelf on the right (3 shelves wide) and quickly ran out of room. Another shelf like the first is too big for my room, but I found this shelf instead. It’s sturdy and easy to put together. It matched very well to the original shelf too, and made for an overall great finished look in that room! At first glance, the box looks too short to be the correct height of this unit, so I thought I had been shipped the wrong thing. But, the two sides come with detached legs that once attached, bring the shelf to full height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: It is sturdy. Pretty. Very functional

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and very sturdy enough to hold many items. I bought a smaller one and liked it so much I bought this unit.The color matches my office desk perfectly. Great strong display shelves for all your favorite things!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to assemble. Very sturdy. Perfect for what I needed it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality! Great looking! Want five more for other areas of my house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars large, study shelf storage
reviews.reviewText: this unit gives me a lot of extra shelf storage. it seems sturdy and stable so far. it wasn't real hard to assemble though I would have preferred being able to use a phillips head screw driver rather than the hex wrench (that is provided).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's so easy to put together!!
reviews.reviewText: It came in a timely manner!! The directions we are very easy to read!! It was exactly what I was looking for!!
